remove_mob_effect.title: Remove Mob Effect
remove_mob_effect.deprecationMessage: This event will be deprecated in 1.21.20 in favor of custom components

effect.title: Effect
effect.description: The mob effect to remove. Use 'all' to remove all mob effects from target.

target.title: Target
target.description: The target context to execute against.

remove_mob_effect.deprecationMessage: This property requires the following experimental toggle(s) enabled in your project config: 'holidayCreatorFeatures'.
